channel.title: I think you will know this!
channel.description: ok i need some help! How can i add item on ground for all time? And how to remove them? [u]Please post![/u]

item.title: I think you will know this!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

To add items in the ground you will need to go to itemspawnpoints.java, in there you can add the itemsâ€¦ here an exmaple:

ItemHandler.addItem(1275, 2911, 4833, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false);

insert it like that, so its item 1275 (rune pick), 2911 x coords, 4833 is y coords, the 1 is how much.

this is how it would look to help you betterItemHandler.addItem(ITEM ID, X CORD, Y CORD, HOW MUCH, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false);
then is spawns, hope this helpd

Read full topic
item.source: I think you will know this!
